---
title: "Child Report, Parameterized from Parent"
output: html_document
params:
  start_date: # NOTE, you have to define the params here in the child even though you'll overwrite from the parent
    input: date
    value: 2011-01-01
    min: 2010-01-01
    label: "Start Date"
---

Here is the start date you have chosen inside the parent document, but now printed in the CHILD document. `r params$start_date`
